message.body: Busy day today. Did some baking and now doing a little work. You?
Not much to be honest. Just got the latest in a book series and I've been pretty engrossed in it. Haha.
Which book series? I commute by train now and im looking for good books.
Been reading a series called the Iron Druid Chronicles. I wasn't too sure when I started it because it is a modern fantasy series but it is pretty good.It almost reminds me of the Dresden Files.
I read Butchers other series Codex Alera and liked it a lot. I haven't read Dresden yet, because im not sure I'll like contemporary fantasy.
I'm working through Steven Erikson's very dark Malazan series now. Not convinced I love it but it's entertaining enough.
